_header: Sith I may not escape me far nor near
_description:
Charles d’Orléans, a roundel translated from the French (Champollion-Figeac (1842)
XChampollion-Figeac, Aime. Les Poesies du duc Charles d’Orleans. Paris, 1842, 36) — 14 lines

BLHar682.First Lines:
Syn y may not askape me fer nor nereAs from the wrath of kare and
                    hevynes…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…I nedis must abiden the redresThat they me geve of payne or
                    displesere
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-2 at end to indicate going back to first four lines of the roundel.
